com.mitchellbosecke.pebble.template

Class Scope

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mitchellbosecke.pebble.template.Scope

  • public class Scope
extends Object
    A scope is a map of variables. If it's a "local" scope that tells the ScopeChain to stop looking for a variable if it can't find it in this particular scope.
    Author:
    Mitchell

     boolean isLocal)

    • Method Detail

      • shallowCopy

        public Scope shallowCopy()
        Creates a shallow copy of the Scope. This is used for the parallel tag because every new thread should have a "snapshot" of the scopes, i.e. one thread should not affect rendering output of another.
        Returns:
